name: Star Trek Episodes: Which Series? Multiple Choice Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Encounter at Far Point Parts I&II
questions.explanation:
TNG & The Next Generation.

	This was the series opener.  We meet Q for the first time.

TNG & The Next Generation.

	Troi temporarily loses her empathic abilities.  She is at a complete loss and does not feel like she can do her job.  She regains her abilities at the end of the episode.

TOS & The Original Series.

	The pilot episode, it took place years before Kirk took command of the Enterprise.  Spock was the only well known character to appear in the pilot.  Majel Barret, Gene Roddenberry's wife, played Number One.

TOS & The Original Series.

	These cute little creatures created major havoc aboard the Enterprise.  Scotty rids the Enterprise of the Tribbles by beaming them aboard a Klingon ship.  Klingons and Tribbles do not like each other.  After Scotty beams the Tribbles aboard the Klingon ship he says to Kirk, "they'll be no tribble at all."

TNG & The Next Generation.

	This was the series finale.  Picard travels back and forth through time (with Q's help) while attempting to prevent the destruction of humanity.  We discover that Picard and Beverly get married and divorced at sometime in the future.

TNG & The Next Generation.

	Deanna is impregnated by an alien.  When the child is born she names him Ian after her father.  Ian grows from a newborn to an eight year old in one day.  When Ian realizes he is the cause of the near crisis on board, he allows his body to die.  Once he returns to his natural form, he tells Deanna that he wanted to experience how human lived by going through the natural process of birth, living, and death.

questions.text: What Are Little Girls Made Of
questions.explanation:
TOS & The Original Series.

	The Enterprise is on EXO III searching for exobiologist Dr. Roger Korby.  Korby had learned how to construct androids to act and look like humans.  Korby kidnapped Kirk to make a duplicate in order to take over the Enterprise.  Kirk was able to plant false memories into the copy so Spock would know it was not really him.

TOS & The Original Series.

	Dr. Janice Lester hates Captain Kirk because she has never been able to captain a starship.  She and Kirk were once involved with each other.  Janice is very ill.  Kirk gets trapped in a life-entity transfer with Janice.  She takes over the ship while in Kirk's body and plans to leave her body with Kirk's essence on the Benecia Colony, elimaniting all of her problems.  In the end everything goes back to normal.

TNG & The Next Generation.

	While on Data's home planet in the Omicron Theta System, the crew finds Data's brother, Lore.

TOS & The Original Series.

	This is the episode where we meet Khan.  Khan was a genetically engineered strongman and one of the leaders of the Earth Eugenics War of the 1990's.  He and his crew aboard the Botany Bay had been in stasis.  Khan, his new companion from the Enterprise, Marla McGivers, and the crew from the Botany Bay take control of the Enterprise.  Khan and his men are soon overtaken and are exiled.  We meet Khan again in "Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan". Khan is out for revenge.
